title: An Act relative to hate crimes

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1262) of Bruce E. Tarr for legislation relative to hate crimes.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
